nodes.text: The Ultimate Star Wars: Episode I Sticker Book

The Ultimate Star Wars: Episode I Sticker Book is an 8-page book filled with four additional pages of stickers of heroes, villains, spacecraft, vehicles, droids, and equipment from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It was originally published by DK in 1999 and additionally offered as part of the Star Wars Episode I: Limited Edition Gift Pack.
Learn about Star Wars: Episode I with this fun and informative sticker book.
Choose the stickers to create your own book of Star Wars: Episode I.
Easy-peel stickers can be used more than once.
